config.easierworldcreator.performance_mo: Uses C++ code allowing better performance (this can however cause some problems and it is only compatible with windows and linux)
config.easierworldcreator.multi_chunk_fe: Place features(trees, vines, mushrooms...) where the size is superior to 3x3 chunks
config.easierworldcreator.chat_warns.des: send chat warnings to players when placing huge structure
config.easierworldcreator.log_warns.desc: send warnings in the logs for better debugging
config.easierworldcreator.log_performanc: send small performance benchmarks in the log
config.ewc.wanna_quit: Are you sure you want to quit? Changes will not be saved
config.ewc.restart_message: You made some changes that requires your game to restart. Click on RESTART to restart your game
ewc.chat_warn: Huge Structure being placed, you might expect some lags
